name: Cisco Customer Collaboration Platform信息泄露漏洞
product: ["Cisco Customer Collaboration Platform <=12.5(1) SU2", "Cisco Customer Collaboration Platform 12.5(1) SU4"]
description: Cisco Customer Collaboration Platform（Cisco CCP）是美国思科（Cisco）公司的一个客户协作平台。Cisco Customer Collaboration Platform存在信息泄露漏洞，该漏洞源于应用对于敏感信息保护不足，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致敏感数据泄露。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://sec.cloudapps.cisco.com/security/center/content/CiscoSecurityAdvisory/cisco-sa-ccp-info-disc-ZyGerQpd
patch: Cisco Customer Collaboration Platform信息泄露漏洞的补丁
